attributes.action: Financial ombudsman against builders for all new homes regardless
attributes.additional_details:
Is beyond humanity how on hearth they continuously getting away with this 
The government needs to act now as it is shameful they let developers on 21 century behave this way 
What it will take for the government to act??
attributes.background:
Tougher measures against developers 
Financial ombudsman to all homes that fall within the 10 year warranty regardless of they had issues 3 years ago or now 
Developers need to stop building bodged homes is danger to society and their mental health

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
